ComicInfo.Summary: Twistory present's PAOLO PARENTE's pinup girl and awesome robot world like you have never seen. Read along as Koshka's Russian KV-47 Squad and a ragtag group of Americans join together to destroy Axis Commander Sigrid Von Thaler's top secret base, located deep behind enemy lines. This time Sigrid is poised to end the Dust War with one final assault on Europe with her new mammoth Gunther robots. Can the Allies save the day? Don't miss the first of three new issues from PAOLO PARENTE's ever-growing DUST universe. This time, it's DUST WARS!
ComicInfo.Title: Gunter Valley: Part One
